item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! The funny thing is that 10 minutes sounds like a really fast game, but I realized that it's actually not all that short. My games still take anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour and I do quite a bit of thinking. As long as you're careful about not studying too much instead of playing, then I think you'll be alright. Hope to see a new post from you soon (but no pressure if you're busy with other things)!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks! The funny thing is that 10 minutes sounds like a really fast game, but I realized that it’s actually not all that short. My games still take anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour and I do quite a bit of thinking.
As long as you’re careful about not studying too much instead of playing, then I think you’ll be alright. Hope to see a new post from you soon (but no pressure if you’re busy with other things)!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ah!! Thank so much for reminding me which post it was that I wrote regarding the 30 min main time! So glad that someone knew what I was referring to. Haha. The funny thing is that I'm not sure I would have really heeded advice like this in the past if it weren't from Myung Wan Kim 9P giving me the guidance. I certainly hope that the new time setting will help you play more games and gain that next stone. Meeting at Congress would be awesome!! I am definitely going so be sure to let me know if you decide to go!
item.content:encoded:
Ah!! Thank so much for reminding me which post it was that I wrote regarding the 30 min main time! So glad that someone knew what I was referring to. Haha.
The funny thing is that I’m not sure I would have really heeded advice like this in the past if it weren’t from Myung Wan Kim 9P giving me the guidance.
I certainly hope that the new time setting will help you play more games and gain that next stone.
Meeting at Congress would be awesome!! I am definitely going so be sure to let me know if you decide to go!

item.title: By: J
item.dc:creator: J
item.description: I find the difference between this post and your "the 6k screwup" post from a while ago where you basically said you would not play games with less than 30 min main time as 10 minutes is just blitz pretty interesting. Anyway, I've been in the same boat for far longer than I'd care to admit, and this post did strike a chord with me. I'm going to try to follow your way and make more of an effort to play game around similar time setting soon. I was stuck at the same rank for a very long time and only recently have I gotten a few ranks stronger from playing some games, hopefully I can continue it. There's also a chance that we could play each other in this years go congress.
item.content:encoded:
I find the difference between this post and your “the 6k screwup” post from a while ago where you basically said you would not play games with less than 30 min main time as 10 minutes is just blitz pretty interesting.
Anyway, I’ve been in the same boat for far longer than I’d care to admit, and this post did strike a chord with me. I’m going to try to follow your way and make more of an effort to play game around similar time setting soon. I was stuck at the same rank for a very long time and only recently have I gotten a few ranks stronger from playing some games, hopefully I can continue it. There’s also a chance that we could play each other in this years go congress.

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: Great post. Was thinking about playing less recently, and i`m not playing as much as before, but sill i think it is good to play some fast games here and then, because one can gain, as you said it very good: experience. :-)
item.content:encoded: Great post. Was thinking about playing less recently, and i`m not playing as much as before, but sill i think it is good to play some fast games here and then, because one can gain, as you said it very good: experience. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad I'm not the only one who thinks so! Haha. Thanks for commenting!
item.content:encoded: Glad I’m not the only one who thinks so! Haha. Thanks for commenting!

item.title: By: Daurak
item.dc:creator: Daurak
item.description: Yup!!! Never met in person (and 2 hr time difference), but definitely a confidence boost. Anytime (almost :P)! Always up for a challenge!
item.content:encoded:
Yup!!! Never met in person (and 2 hr time difference), but definitely a confidence boost.
Anytime (almost :P)! Always up for a challenge!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: That's awesome that you have a friend who plays with you on a regular basis. Definitely a great way to keep motivated and improve! Thanks for sharing your experience and hope to play you soon!
item.content:encoded:
That’s awesome that you have a friend who plays with you on a regular basis. Definitely a great way to keep motivated and improve!
Thanks for sharing your experience and hope to play you soon!
